text: Ara smarana karuna [1], yakhana amara ka’ba gharake manabajatira milanakendra [2] o nirapattasthala [3] karechilama ebam balechilama, tomara makame ibarahimake salatera sthana rupe grahana karo [4]. Ara ibarahima o isama’ilake adesa diyechilama ta'oyaphakari, i’tikaphakari, ruku’ o sijadakaridera jan'ya [5] amara gharake pabitra rakhate
